plot outline: Older couple Professor Yashwant Rajadhyaksha and his wife Sumati have always been each others support while Rajadhyaksha is man of principles but tragedy shook them few years back when they lost their young daughter Swetha.A documentary filmmaker Swetha was in Kalambi village where farmers are debt ridden and dying of hunger she came across rich brats Sushant Mahashabde,Rakesh Satoskar and Ajay Shah who harassed the villagers for their land and money given on land.Swetha was killed by the trio as she had proof of recording how the trio harassed the villagers Rajadhyaksha was witness to the murder but the court of law acquitted all the accused due to lack of evidence and power of money .Rajadhyaksha lives with the guilt of not being able to give justice to his daughter and starts eliminating them one by one while Sumati has his support ACP Vikrant Marathe is assigned the case and is very much confident that Rajadhyaksha is behind the killings but has no proof to arrest him.
title: Jetaa
plot: Older couple Professor Yashwant Rajadhyaksha and his wife Sumati have always been each others support while Rajadhyaksha is man of principles but tragedy shook them few years back when they lost their young daughter Swetha.A documentary filmmaker Swetha was in Kalambi village where farmers are debt ridden and dying of hunger she came across rich brats Sushant Mahashabde,Rakesh Satoskar and Ajay Shah who harassed the villagers for their land and money given on land.Swetha was killed by the trio as she had proof of recording how the trio harassed the villagers Rajadhyaksha was witness to the murder but the court of law acquitted all the accused due to lack of evidence and power of money .Rajadhyaksha lives with the guilt of not being able to give justice to his daughter and starts eliminating them one by one while Sumati has his support ACP Vikrant Marathe is assigned the case and is very much confident that Rajadhyaksha is behind the killings but has no proof to arrest him.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
